briefTitle: Cold Snare Piecemeal Resection vs Cold Snare Endoscopic Mucosal Resection
briefSummary: The study will compare the use of cold snare piecemeal resection (CSPR) vs cold endoscopic mucosal resection (Cold EMR). The study will include two cohorts: one cohort for conventional adenomas 10-19mm in size and one cohort for serrated lesions 10mm or larger.
